oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Analysis of OFF research topics in CORE Organic participating countries
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nykänen, Arja
Canali, Stefano
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This analysis of OFF research in the participating countries of CORE Organic is based on titles of projects running during the time period 2000-2007, with some variation from country to country. Lists of project titles were taken from country reports.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Nykänen, Arja and Canali, Stefano (2006) Analysis of OFF research topics in CORE Organic participating countries. CORE Organic.
